constraints.name: tree_structure
constraints.description: 图必须是树结构（连通且无环）

constraints.name: edge_length_fixed
constraints.description: 每条边的长度必须为 1，允许的绝对误差不超过 10^-6

constraints.name: point_distance_min
constraints.description: 任意两点之间的距离至少为 10^-4

constraints.name: non_adjacent_edge_distance_min
constraints.description: 不相邻的边之间的最小距离至少为 10^-6

constraints.name: coordinate_bound
constraints.description: 所有点的坐标绝对值不得超过 3000
